Name: Vampire Survivors
About the game: Vampire Survivors is a time survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements. There's no place where to hide, all you can do is try to survive a cursed night and get as much gold as possible for the next survivor, before Death inevitably puts an end to your struggles. Content in the Early Access version Supports mouse, keyboard, controller, and touch screen. Starting Tips Take your time to grab gems and items, they won't disappear. Get two or three offensive weapons at first, but focus on leveling them up one at a time. Armor and Luck are good starting power-ups to spend money on. Refund power-ups often, it's free, and try new upgrade paths. Hi Eli ðŸ‘‹
